name: ITD World
description: ITD World is an award-winning global coaching, talent, and leadership expert with presence in six continents and a mission to transform leaders and change the world for the better. Our core customer value innovation centres in the areas of results-based coaching, leadership and talent development, corporate training, professional competency certifications, action learning, mentoring and consulting for clients worldwide. Having trained and developed leaders from over 80 countries, for over 30 years, we have served thousands of organizations globally, including many of the world’s leading multinational corporations, government agencies, non-profits, and institutions. Our ability to deliver comprehensive solutions to leading global organizations leverages on the award-winning expertise of our talented, technologically competent multicultural team around the world. We embody the core values of Love, Innovation, Synergy, Trust, Excellence, and Nurture (LISTEN) to enable outstanding results that makes profound impact using face-to-face and online deliveries.
features: We are curious and ask great questions to make new discoveries
We harness and capitalise on people’s strengths
We are honest, open and diplomatic
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Transforming leaders and changing the world for the better
ShortDescription: ITD World is an award-winning global coaching, talent, and leadership expert with presence in six continents and a mission to transform leaders and change the world for the better.
enhanced_description: ITD World, established in 1984, is an award-winning global expert in coaching, talent, and leadership development, operating across six continents. Their mission is to transform leaders and contribute to global betterment through a focus on results-based coaching, leadership and talent development, corporate training, professional competency certifications, action learning, mentoring, and consulting. With over 30 years of experience, ITD World has served thousands of organizations globally, including leading multinational corporations, government agencies, non-profits, and institutions, having trained leaders from over 80 countries. Their comprehensive solutions are delivered by a technologically competent, multicultural team through both face-to-face and online methods, embodying core values of Love, Innovation, Synergy, Trust, Excellence, and Nurture (LISTEN) to achieve profound impact.
competitive_advantages: Trained and developed leaders from over 80 countries
Delivery via face-to-face and online methods
Driven by core values: Love, Innovation, Synergy, Trust, Excellence, Nurture (LISTEN)
roi_benefits: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Enable outstanding results and profound impact
Transform leaders for organizational and global betterment
scalability_features: Ability to serve thousands of organizations globally
